definitions.definition: The act or process of purifying ; the removal of impurities .
A religious act or rite in which a defiled person is made clean or free from sin .
The pouring of wine into the chalice to rinse it after communion , the wine being then drunk by the priest .

main_definition: The act or process of purifying ; the removal of impurities .
secondary_definitions: A religious act or rite in which a defiled person is made clean or free from sin .
( Christianity ) The pouring of wine into the chalice to rinse it after communion , the wine being then drunk by the priest .
